nodes.title: Atomics.wait on main thread
nodes.description: Remove restriction from blocking the main thread to remove spin-loop hacks that users are currently doing.

nodes.title: Binary macros
nodes.description: Add a binary macro feature to reduce the in-memory size of modules.

nodes.title: BYOB readable streams
nodes.description: [Adapt readable streams spec to work with wasm shared memory](https://github.com/WebAssembly/memory-control/blob/main/proposals/memory-control/byob.md)

nodes.title: call_indirect speculative inlining
nodes.description: Speculate monomorphic/polymorphic call_indirect instructions, like we do with call_ref.

nodes.title: Compact binary imports
nodes.description: [Remove redundancy from binary format around imports](https://github.com/WebAssembly/compact-import-section)

nodes.title: Component Model MVP
nodes.description: [Portable, composable, separately compiled, wasm components](https://github.com/WebAssembly/component-model)

nodes.title: Component Model WebIDL bindings
nodes.description: Map component types with WebIDL types to allow direct importing of WebIDL interfaces.

nodes.title: Custom descriptors
nodes.description: [Store wasm values in the RTT of a GC object for space savings](https://github.com/WebAssembly/custom-descriptors)

nodes.title: ESM integration
nodes.description: [Integrate wasm modules into the ESM loader](https://github.com/WebAssembly/esm-integration)

nodes.title: In-memory caching of modules
nodes.description: Add an in-memory cache of compiled wasm modules. Integrate with the browser script loader when we have esm-integration.

nodes.title: Inline subset of wasm into JS
nodes.description: Inline a small subset of wasm opcodes into JS. Improves performance of tiny accessors functions.

nodes.title: Integrate wasm-explorer in devtools
nodes.description: Replace the wasmparser.js/CodeMirror wasm viewer with an embedded wasm-explorer component. Reduces maintenance burden.

nodes.title: JS interop of GC objects
nodes.description: [Set the prototype of GC objects so that they interop with JS code](https://github.com/WebAssembly/custom-descriptors)

nodes.title: JS promise integration
nodes.description: [Suspend and resume wasm execution in response to JS promises](https://github.com/WebAssembly/js-promise-integration)

nodes.title: JS type reflection
nodes.description: [Add a type accessor to wasm objects exposed to JS](https://github.com/WebAssembly/js-types)

nodes.title: Lazy baseline compilation
nodes.description: Skip baseline compilation and only validate initially. Compile baseline functions on demand.

nodes.title: memory.discard
nodes.description: [Allow users to give pages back to the OS](https://github.com/WebAssembly/memory-control/blob/main/proposals/memory-control/discard.md)

nodes.title: memory.map array buffers
nodes.description: Map an array buffer into the high half of wasm memory. Uses the high-bit as guard to execute an alternative load/store path for memory accesses.

nodes.title: MIR visualizer
nodes.description: Create an interactive HTML based iongraph tool that is easier to read and analyze.

nodes.title: MIR visualizer in profiler
nodes.description: Integrate the new MIR visualizer in the profiler, with sample counts for finding hot code.

nodes.title: Move barrier execution into OOL code
nodes.description: Improve code layout for common case, reducing icache pressure and mispredictions.

nodes.title: Move cross-instance call slow path into OOL code
nodes.description: Improve code layout for common case, reducing icache pressure and mispredictions.

nodes.title: Move null traps into OOL code
nodes.description: Improve code layout for common case, reducing icache pressure and mispredictions.

nodes.title: Optimize calls to imports of known builtins
nodes.description: Let users import builtins like `DataView.prototype.XYZ` and have calls to that import skip the JS interpreter exit and go directly to the native implementation.

nodes.title: Optimize stack map creation and storage
nodes.description: Allow sharing identical stack maps between call sites, speed up creation of them in baseline.

nodes.title: Optimize the linking step for huge modules
nodes.description: The linking step is linear in module size and doesn't benefit much from parallelism. Find a way to speed it up.

nodes.title: OSR of baseline
nodes.description: Add on-stack-replacement of baseline functions so that we can tier up in long running baseline code.

nodes.title: Primitive builtins
nodes.description: [Builtins for manipulating JS primitives](https://github.com/WebAssembly/js-primitive-builtins)

nodes.title: regalloc2
nodes.description: Find a way to improve quality of register allocations for very hot code. Maybe import regalloc2/3?

nodes.title: relaxed atomics
nodes.description: [Add a relaxed consistency to atomic memory accesses for improved performance](https://github.com/WebAssembly/shared-everything-threads)

nodes.title: Remove asm.js
nodes.description: Less security and fuzz bugs to deal with.

nodes.title: Replace stub generators with Ion or Baseline
nodes.description: Simplify our JIT entry/exits stubs by replacing them with special wasm opcodes and compiling them in Ion/Baseline with special prologue/epilogues.

nodes.title: Shared function references
nodes.description: Allow sharing a funcref across worker threads. Enables dynamic linking with shared memory, and reduces memory usage.

nodes.title: Shared GC objects
nodes.description: [Add shared GC objects so GC modules can work across threads](https://github.com/WebAssembly/shared-everything-threads)

nodes.title: Source phase imports
nodes.description: [Allow JS to import the 'source' of a module](https://github.com/tc39/proposal-source-phase-imports)

nodes.title: Stack switching
nodes.description: [Suspend and resume wasm execution in wasm code](https://github.com/WebAssembly/stack-switching)

nodes.title: Standard debug adapter component
nodes.description: Standardize a debug adapter protocol based on components. Get toolchains to support it, and support it in our DevTools.

nodes.title: Static memory protection
nodes.description: [Give wasm memory a no-access, read-only, and read-write regions](https://github.com/WebAssembly/memory-control/blob/main/proposals/memory-control/static-protection.md).

nodes.title: String builtins V2
nodes.description: Add a builtin type import for strings for reduced type checks, and better UTF-8 support.

nodes.title: Support more reftypes in JIT entry/exit stubs
nodes.description: Support more reftypes in JIT entry/exits stubs for faster entry/exit of wasm-GC code.

nodes.title: Type imports
nodes.description: [Allow importing a type so users can import an abstract interface that doesn't expose the exact representation](https://github.com/WebAssembly/proposal-type-imports)

nodes.title: Update caching to work with lazy tiering
nodes.description: Get caching working with lazy tiering.

nodes.title: Use GC buffer allocator for OOL data
nodes.description: Simplify GC by removing Malloc'ed block cache, and maybe improve performance.

nodes.title: wasm-decompiler
nodes.description: Make a [decompiler](https://github.com/eqrion/wasm-decompile) that makes analyzing what a wasm function is doing simpler. Integrate it into wasm-explorer.

nodes.title: wasm-explorer
nodes.description: Start an open-source [wasm-explorer] project for efficiently analyzing very large wasm module. Contribute it to the bytecode alliance and try to get external contributors.

nodes.title: Wasm TLS or per-stack context
nodes.description: [Add thread-local globals or the per-stack context feature so that source language TLS works with shared functions](https://github.com/WebAssembly/shared-everything-threads)
